Name: Anachronox
About the game: Join Sylvester 'Sly' Boots and Stiletto Anyway as they trek across six bizarre planets investigating a galaxy-crushing mystery, searching for artefacts from an extinct alien race and unlocking the secrets of a powerful, advanced technology. It's your turn. PICK YOUR POISON. Key Features: Craft your team from a cast of seven characters. Unravel evil galactic schemes, solve devious puzzles and fight wicked monsters. Immerse yourself in amazing turn-based real-time battles. Assemble alien weapons and master challenging mini-games. All this, plus mind-blowing cinematics and a heavy dose of gut-busting humour.
